commit.message: [BEAM-9832] Ensuring tags are not added to ProcessBundleDescriptors on the worker-side

nodes.bodyText:
It would be weird that accessing the dict adds the entry in this case but if this is the solution then it would be better we created a copy of the dict we pass from here:

  
    
      beam/sdks/python/apache_beam/runners/worker/bundle_processor.py
    
    
         Line 1038
      in
      2434d49
    
    
    
    

        
          
           tag_to_pcollection_id = self.process_bundle_descriptor.transforms[
